mapper.update: update tb_hxp_tags set tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_name = #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_title = #{tagTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_img = #{tagImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_count = #{tagCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, tag_id, tag_name, tag_title, tag_img, tag_count, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remark, is_deleted from tb_hxp_tags where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, tag_id, tag_name, tag_title, tag_img, tag_count, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remark, is_deleted from tb_hxp_tags order by create_date desc
